content.raw:
I just built sdformat2 2.2.1, and it triggered some debbuild jobs with a blank distro variable.
~~~
$ ../release-tools/release.py --dry-run -r 1 -e sdformat2 2.2.1 TOKEN
...
Accessing: http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat2-debbuilder/buildWithParameters?RELEASE_REPO_BRANCH=default&PACKAGE=sdformat2&RELEASE_VERSION=1&token=TOKEN&VERSION=2.2.1&PACKAGE_ALIAS=sdformat2&SOURCE_TARBALL_URI=http%3A%2F%2Fold.gazebosim.org%2Fassets%2Fdistributions%2Fsdformat-2.2.1.tar.bz2&ARCH=amd64&DISTRO=precise
Accessing: http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat2-debbuilder/buildWithParameters?RELEASE_REPO_BRANCH=default&PACKAGE=sdformat2&RELEASE_VERSION=1&token=TOKEN&VERSION=2.2.1&PACKAGE_ALIAS=sdformat2&SOURCE_TARBALL_URI=http%3A%2F%2Fold.gazebosim.org%2Fassets%2Fdistributions%2Fsdformat-2.2.1.tar.bz2&ARCH=i386&DISTRO=precise
Accessing: http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat2-debbuilder/buildWithParameters?RELEASE_REPO_BRANCH=default&PACKAGE=sdformat2&RELEASE_VERSION=1&token=TOKEN&VERSION=2.2.1&PACKAGE_ALIAS=sdformat2&SOURCE_TARBALL_URI=http%3A%2F%2Fold.gazebosim.org%2Fassets%2Fdistributions%2Fsdformat-2.2.1.tar.bz2&ARCH=amd64&DISTRO=trusty
Accessing: http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat2-debbuilder/buildWithParameters?RELEASE_REPO_BRANCH=default&PACKAGE=sdformat2&RELEASE_VERSION=1&token=TOKEN&VERSION=2.2.1&PACKAGE_ALIAS=sdformat2&SOURCE_TARBALL_URI=http%3A%2F%2Fold.gazebosim.org%2Fassets%2Fdistributions%2Fsdformat-2.2.1.tar.bz2&ARCH=i386&DISTRO=trusty
Accessing: http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat2-debbuilder/buildWithParameters?RELEASE_REPO_BRANCH=default&PACKAGE=sdformat2&RELEASE_VERSION=1&token=TOKEN&VERSION=2.2.1&PACKAGE_ALIAS=sdformat2&SOURCE_TARBALL_URI=http%3A%2F%2Fold.gazebosim.org%2Fassets%2Fdistributions%2Fsdformat-2.2.1.tar.bz2&ARCH=amd64&DISTRO=
Accessing: http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat2-debbuilder/buildWithParameters?RELEASE_REPO_BRANCH=default&PACKAGE=sdformat2&RELEASE_VERSION=1&token=TOKEN&VERSION=2.2.1&PACKAGE_ALIAS=sdformat2&SOURCE_TARBALL_URI=http%3A%2F%2Fold.gazebosim.org%2Fassets%2Fdistributions%2Fsdformat-2.2.1.tar.bz2&ARCH=i386&DISTRO=
~~~

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/debbuild/job/sdformat2-debbuilder/367/
* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/debbuild/job/sdformat2-debbuilder/368/
